traits.name: Heated Body
entries: A creature that touches the snake or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The snake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) piercing damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 3 (1d4 + 1 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage.
